About Us

Home About Us
Our Mission

To provide precise, personalized civil engineering services and products that satisfy clients’ needs by leveraging highly skilled staff, strong relationships, and cost-effective solutions in an atmosphere that fosters collaboration and creativity.
Our Vision

Be a competent engineering, construction and project management company by achieving extraordinary results for our customers, building satisfying careers for our people, and earning a fair return on the value we deliver.
Core Values

Our Journey

A little of our background history.

Footnote Consults Limited, FCL is a privately owned company that was established by Ugandans in January 2018.

The Company offers a broad spectrum of services in Civil Engineering, Architecture and Project management.

FCL is constituted by smart hardworking and resilient engineers, architects and project managers adaptive to the revolving technology and innovation to provide client-centered specific satisfaction. FCL majors in Engineering Consultancy and project management. However, we partner with Delanne Group Ltd and Bluecore Uganda Limited as our reliable affiliates in Real estate, Credit/ Finance and Supplies and Construction of Civil works. Over the years, we have accomplished a number of residential and commercial buildings and apartments within Kampala and Wakiso under design and build arrangements, designs and design reviews for roads and drainage structures within Kampala and Wakiso, Civil and Electrical works/ services/ supplies for High Voltage – Substations in Uganda and Supply of building material and furniture all over the country. We strive to harness a hybrid of efficient and effective technology to always serve our esteemed clientele base. We assure you of a client-centered service and we thank you for choosing us.

Client reviews

Kamukama Abel

"I am very happy with Footnote Consults, they have the best price and most reasonable around for drawings. Plus they also did a fantastic job of creating my vision into a workable plan for my project. I highly recommend them for your construction projects."

Sodyo Yonah

"Footnote Consults performed very professionally with great communication and excellent onsite project management. They earned our confidence during the construction of our house in Namugongo."

Elalu lamech Lero

"Footnote constructed our apartments and did an amazing job. The quality control checks were carried out timely to allow for informed decisions to be made before cover up. It made sure the work was so coordinated so that there were no delays and kept the work flowing to achieve timely completion."

Okori Dennis

"I can confidently say that Footnote is a reliable construction company. The site supervisors and foremen exhibit cordial professionalism, knowledge and great team work. Everyone on the team seems to be personally invested in producing quality work."

About Company

Footnote Consults Limited, FCL is a private owned company that was established in 2018. The Company offers a broad spectrum in Civil engineering, Architecture and Project management. FCL is constituted by smart hardworking and resilient engineers, architects and project managers that will add every bit of value to money.
